title: Was the spokesman for the Republican National Congress Party Abe Johnson a lawyer for "Voice in the House of Representatives "?
subtitle: The anti-abortion activist tweeted that she believed in "one voice" for every "Pete of God," even though couples had the last word.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Abby Johnson, an anti-abortion activist who spoke at the 2020 Republican National Congress, earlier called for "household voting" where the husband "gets the last word."
